org.openqa.selenium.chrome

类 ChromeOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeOptions

  • public class ChromeOptions
extends Object
    Class to manage options specific to ChromeDriver.

    Example usage: 

    
 ChromeOptions options = new ChromeOptions()
 options.addExtensions(new File("/path/to/extension.crx"))
 options.setBinary(new File("/path/to/chrome"));

 // For use with ChromeDriver:
 ChromeDriver driver = new ChromeDriver(options);

 // or alternatively:
 DesiredCapabilities capabilities = DesiredCapabilities.chrome();
 capabilities.setCapability(ChromeOptions.CAPABILITY, options);
 ChromeDriver driver = new ChromeDriver(capabilities);

 // For use with RemoteWebDriver:
 DesiredCapabilities capabilities = DesiredCapabilities.chrome();
 capabilities.setCapability(ChromeOptions.CAPABILITY, options);
 RemoteWebDriver driver = new RemoteWebDriver(
     new URL("http://localhost:4444/wd/hub"), capabilities);
    从以下版本开始:
    Since chromedriver v17.0.963.0

    • 方法详细资料

      • setBinary

        public void setBinary(File path)
        Sets the path to the Chrome executable. This path should exist on the machine which will launch Chrome. The path should either be absolute or relative to the location of running ChromeDriver server.
        参数:
        path - Path to Chrome executable.

      • setBinary

        public void setBinary(String path)
        Sets the path to the Chrome executable. This path should exist on the machine which will launch Chrome. The path should either be absolute or relative to the location of running ChromeDriver server.
        参数:
        path - Path to Chrome executable.

      • addArguments

        public void addArguments(String... arguments)
        参数:
        arguments - The arguments to use when starting Chrome.
        另请参阅:
        addArguments(java.util.List)

      • addArguments

        public void addArguments(List<String> arguments)
        Adds additional command line arguments to be used when starting Chrome. For example: 
        
   options.setArguments(
       "load-extension=/path/to/unpacked_extension",
       "allow-outdated-plugins");

        Each argument may contain an option "--" prefix: "--foo" or "foo". Arguments with an associated value should be delimitted with an "=": "foo=bar".

        参数:
        arguments - The arguments to use when starting Chrome.

      • addExtensions

        public void addExtensions(File... paths)
        参数:
        paths - Paths to the extensions to install.
        另请参阅:
        addExtensions(java.util.List)

      • addExtensions

        public void addExtensions(List<File> paths)
        Adds a new Chrome extension to install on browser startup. Each path should specify a packed Chrome extension (CRX file).
        参数:
        paths - Paths to the extensions to install.

      • addEncodedExtensions

        public void addEncodedExtensions(String... encoded)
        参数:
        encoded - Base64 encoded data of the extensions to install.
        另请参阅:
        addEncodedExtensions(java.util.List)

      • addEncodedExtensions

        public void addEncodedExtensions(List<String> encoded)
        Adds a new Chrome extension to install on browser startup. Each string data should specify a Base64 encoded string of packed Chrome extension (CRX file).
        参数:
        encoded - Base64 encoded data of the extensions to install.

      • setExperimentalOption

        public void setExperimentalOption(String name,
                                  Object value)
        Sets an experimental option. Useful for new ChromeDriver options not yet exposed through the ChromeOptions API.
        参数:
        name - Name of the experimental option.
        value - Value of the experimental option, which must be convertible to JSON.

      • getExperimentalOption

        public Object getExperimentalOption(String name)
        Returns the value of an experimental option.
        参数:
        name - The option name.
        返回:
        The option value, or null if not set.

      • toJson

        public com.google.gson.JsonElement toJson()
                                   throws IOException
        Converts this instance to its JSON representation.
        返回:
        The JSON representation of these options.
        抛出:
        IOException - If an error occurs while reading the extension files from disk.
